steps.text: Welcome! üç≥ Tap a cuisine for inspiration, or type your own recipe idea below.
Describe what you'd like to make. For example, 'Quick pasta with chicken and spinach' or 'Low-carb dessert ideas'.
Got an image of a dish or a recipe URL? Tap the '+' to import or get ideas from it!
No mood to type? Tap the microphone and speak your recipe request!
Hit send and watch the AI chef create a recipe just for you!
Tap the filters icon to set your dietary preferences and allergies so recipes match your needs.
Open generation settings to tweak chef personalities, recipe difficulty, and portion sizes.
